Class Bisection

Determine the roots of functions with the bisection method

Methods

Static calculateAllRoots

  • calculateAllRoots(a: number, b: number, step: number, f: (x: number) => number): number[]
    • Defined in Bisection.ts:146

    Calculate all the roots of a function f, in the interval [a, b] with a specified step. The closer the step is to zero, the longer the calculation time will be but the more the result will be guaranteed.

    Parameters

    • a: number

      The first value of the interval

    • b: number

      The second value of the interval

    • step: number

      The step that determines the precision

    • f: (x: number) => number

      The function

        • (x: number): number

        • Parameters

          • x: number

          Returns number

    Returns number[]

Static calculateIntervals

  • calculateIntervals(a: number, b: number, step: number, f: (x: number) => number): number[][]
    • Defined in Bisection.ts:41

    Determine all intervals of x in the function f that have images f(x) with opposite signs in an interval [a, b]. The closer the step is to zero, the longer the calculation time will be but the more the result will be guaranteed.

    Parameters

    • a: number

      The first value of the interval

    • b: number

      The second value of the interval

    • step: number

      The step that determines the precision

    • f: (x: number) => number

      The function

        • (x: number): number

        • Parameters

          • x: number

          Returns number

    Returns number[][]

Static calculateRoot

  • calculateRoot(a: number, b: number, f: (x: number) => number): number
    • Defined in Bisection.ts:12

    Determine the root of a function in a interval of [a, b]. This function gives only one root in this interval, to determine all the roots in this interval use calculateAllRoots

    Parameters

    • a: number

      The first value of the interval

    • b: number

      The second value of the interval

    • f: (x: number) => number

      The function

        • (x: number): number

        • Parameters

          • x: number

          Returns number

    Returns number

Static round

  • round(x: number): number
    • Defined in Bisection.ts:166

    Round the number to avoid values that are near 0 to be not equal to the exact zero.

    Parameters

    • x: number

      The value to round

    Returns number
